1   package com.test.vendor.neo4j;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   
5   public abstract class ConcreteNeo4jSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
6   
7       public ConcreteNeo4jSuiteIT() {
8   
9           this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:neo4j:bolt://jsql-neo4j";
10          this.jdbcUser = "neo4j";
11          this.jdbcPass = "test";
12          
13          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "neo4j";
14          this.jsqlTableName = "Movie";
15          this.jsqlColumnName = "title";
16          
17          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "A";
18          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "label";
19          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "d";
20          
21          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "RETURN 'neo4j' AS A";
22          
23          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames =
24               "CALL db.labels() "
25              +"YIELD label      "
26              +"WITH label       "
27              +"RETURN   label   ";
28          
29          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames =
30               "MATCH (n:Movie)               "
31              +"WITH collect(keys(n)) AS attr "
32              +"UNWIND attr AS r              "
33              +"WITH DISTINCT r[0] AS d       "
34              +"ORDER BY d                    "
35              +"RETURN  d                     ";
36          
37          this.jdbcQueryForValues =
38               "MATCH (n:Movie)         "
39              +"WITH DISTINCT n         "
40              +"RETURN n.title as title ";
41      }
42  }
